basic.name: Frostbolt (Q)
basic.description: Deal 184 damage and Chill the target.

basic.name: Blizzard (W)
basic.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, each dealing 142 damage. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

heroic.name: Ring of Frost (R)
heroic.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

heroic.name: Summon Water Elemental (R)
heroic.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.

trait.name: Frostbite (T)
trait.description: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, Slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her Abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds. Quest: Deal 12000 Ability damage to Chilled Heroes. Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block Ability, allowing Jaina to become temporarily Invulnerable.

1.name: Snowstorm
1.description: {highlight}The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 12.5%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 25%. This damage is increased by 300% against non-heroic units.{/highlight}

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Fingers of Frost
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first two targets.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20. Passive: While above 75% Mana, Jaina gains 10% Spell Power.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Enemies that attack Jaina {highlight}or frost armor{/highlight} are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.{highlight}Activate to transfer your Frost Armor charge to an allied Hero, lasting 6 seconds.{/highlight}

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 10 Mana.{highlight} Increase Frostbolt's range and travel speed by 30%.{/highlight}

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, doubled against Chilled Heroes, up to a maximum of 8 seconds per use.

7.name: Ice Mirage
7.description: {highlight}Activate to become Perfect Stealth for 1.5 seconds, gaining 30% Movement Speed and leaving ice mirage trails on the path.{/highlight}

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Mass Teleport
13.description: {highlight}Activate to teleport Jaina and all allied Troops and Mercenary Camp units around her to target Troop or Structure after 3 seconds.{/highlight}

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Brilliance Aura
16.description: {highlight}After 1 second of activating, Jaina will grant every allied Hero 2000% Mana regeneration and 10% Spell Power for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 15 seconds.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Ice Control
20.description: {highlight}For every Chilled enemy Hero, Jaina receives 100% faster recharge rate on Ice Block and 5% Spell Power.{/highlight}

20.name: Deep Chill
20.description: {highlight}Increases blizzard cast range by 75% and area of effect by 40%, while adding 2 extra waves of damage.{/highlight}
